TopicTitle: How to upload addon to spaceport?

Articles.Content: I tried yesterday, everything seemed OK. I put image, name, zip file, descriptions etc. I pressed upload and waited patiently until info that my addon had been uploaded showed. I couldn't see it in My Add-ons or search for it but I decided to wait. Today it was still not there so I uploaded it again. Same story. What am I doing wrong?
Yes, this is very annoying. As a workaround, upload it as a private mod, then change it over to public once it is uploaded. It should upload pretty much instantly.
